abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.para: This guide is intended to detail design considerations, configuration, deployment and ongoing operational practices for the successful implementation of OpenStack services atop or in concert with NetApp technologies. Please note that this version of the guide applies to the Juno (Fall 2014) release of OpenStack. The Icehouse release and prior are documented in version 3.0 available at http://www.netapp.com/openstack.
